author: Peter Rudegeair
title: Startup Awarded $706 Million In Legal Tussle With Quicken Loans Affiliate
text:
A Texas jury ordered an affiliate of mortgage lender Quicken Loans Inc. this week to pay $706 million to a real-estate technology startup that had accused it of misappropriating intellectual property.
Amrock Inc., a provider of title insurance and real-estate valuations that has the same owner as Quicken Loans, was told to pay the nine-figure sum to startup HouseCanary Inc. on Wednesday.
Amrock...
